location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to Francis Warden, Secretary to the Government, Bombay

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage which has obscured some of the date, leaving 20 J... .

mods.abstract: The letter is an acknowledgement of the receipt of the government's commands dated 7 May 1807. The Resident will reply in full once the necessary enquiries have been made.The dates of the surrounding correspondence suggest that the date of this letter is 20 July 1807.
